          <title>
            <string language="de">Der Weg zum Augsburger Religionsfrieden</string>
            <string language="en">Leading to the Confessional Peace of Augsburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mener à la paix confessionnelle d'Augsbourg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conduzir à paz confessional de Augsburg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conducendo alla pace confessionale di Augusta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδήγηση στην εξομολογητική ειρήνη του Αουγκσμπουργκ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El conducir a la paz confesional de Augsburg</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Sechs Abbildungen sind die Schritte zum Augsburger Religionsfrieden zuzuordnen. Es ergibt sich ein Lösungswort</string>
            <string language="en">Match the different steps leading to the confessional peace of Augsburg to the six illustrations. A solution word results.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="de">Christentum</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="de">Augsburger Religionsfrieden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Christianity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Catholicism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Protest anti-mash</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lutheraner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Augsburger confessional peaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appariez les différentes étapes menant à la 
paix confessionnelle d'Augsbourg aux six illustrations. 
Résultats d'un mot de solution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combine as etapas diferentes que conduzem à paz 
confessional de Augsburg às seis ilustrações. Resultados de 
uma palavra da solução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbini i punti differenti che conducono alla pace 
confessionale di Augusta alle sei illustrazioni. Risultati di 
parola della soluzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάξτε με τα διαφορετικά στάδια που οδηγούν στην 
εξομολογητική ειρήνη του Αουγκσμπουργκ στις έξι απεικονίσεις. 
Αποτελέσματα μιας λύσης λέξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corresponda con los diversos pasos de progresión 
que conducen a la paz confesional de Augsburg a las seis 
ilustraciones. Resultados de una palabra de la solución.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
